title: Understanding Death and Rebirth | HH Stoka Krishna Swami
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: It is immutable, it does not undergo any change, whatever changes we see are changes of the body
or even the changes that we perceive in a person are the changes in the mind
but the soul is different from the body and the mind, so soul is unchanging, it is immutable.
As a person puts on new garments giving up old and useless ones
the soul similarly accepts new bodies, material bodies giving up old and useless ones.
So Krishna explains that when the body becomes old and useless
that is when we give up this body and we accept another new material body.
That change of body is called death and rebirth, punar janma.
Krishna also says for one who has taken birth, death is certain
and for one who dies, birth is certain.
Therefore he tells Arjuna, you should not lament in the unavoidable discharge of your duty as a Kshatriya.
You should not lament in the unavoidable discharge of your duty as a Kshatriya.
